verses.verse: Now <WG1161> the Spirit <WG4151> speaketh <WG3004> <WG5719> expressly <WG4490>, that <WG3754> in <WG1722> the latter <WG5306> times <WG2540> some <WG5100> shall depart from <WG868> <WG5695> the faith <WG4102>, giving heed <WG4337> <WG5723> to seducing <WG4108> spirits <WG4151>, and <WG2532> doctrines <WG1319> of devils <WG1140>;
Speaking lies <WG5573> in <WG1722> hypocrisy <WG5272>; having <WG2743> their <WG2398> conscience <WG4893> seared with a hot iron <WG2743> <WG5772>;

Forbidding <WG2967> <WG5723> to marry <WG1060> <WG5721>, and commanding to abstain from <WG567> <WG5733> meats <WG1033>, which <WG3739> 'Elohim <WG2316> hath created <WG2936> <WG5656> to <WG1519> be received <WG3336> with <WG3326> thanksgiving <WG2169> of them which believe <WG4103> and <WG2532> know <WG1921> <WG5761> the truth <WG225>.

For <WG3754> every <WG3956> creature <WG2938> of 'Elohim <WG2316> is good <WG2570>, and <WG2532> nothing <WG3762> to be refused <WG579>, if it be received <WG2983> <WG5746> with <WG3326> thanksgiving <WG2169>:
For <WG1063> it is sanctified <WG37> <WG5743> by <WG1223> the word <WG3056> of 'Elohim <WG2316> and <WG2532> prayer <WG1783>.

If thou put <WG5294> the brethren <WG80> in remembrance <WG5294> <WG5734> of these things <WG5023>, thou shalt be <WG2071> <WG5704> a good <WG2570> minister <WG1249> of Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547>, nourished up <WG1789> <WG5746> in the words <WG3056> of faith <WG4102> and <WG2532> of good <WG2570> doctrine <WG1319>, whereunto <WG3739> thou hast attained <WG3877> <WG5758>.

But <WG1161> refuse <WG3868> <WG5737> profane <WG952> and <WG2532> old wives <WG1126>' fables <WG3454>, and <WG1161> exercise <WG1128> <WG5720> thyself <WG4572> rather unto <WG4314> godliness <WG2150>.

For <WG1063> bodily <WG4984> exercise <WG1129> profiteth <WG2076> <WG5748> <WG5624> little <WG4314> <WG3641>: but <WG1161> godliness <WG2150> is <WG2076> <WG5748> profitable <WG5624> unto <WG4314> all things <WG3956>, having <WG2192> <WG5723> promise <WG1860> of the life <WG2222> that now is <WG3568>, and <WG2532> of that which is to come <WG3195> <WG5723>.
This is a faithful <WG4103> saying <WG3056> and <WG2532> worthy <WG514> of all <WG3956> acceptation <WG594>.

For <WG1063> therefore <WG1519> <WG5124> we <WG2872> both <WG2532> labour <WG2872> <WG5719> and <WG2532> suffer reproach <WG3679> <WG5743>, because <WG3754> we trust <WG1679> <WG5758> in <WG1909> the living <WG2198> <WG5723> 'Elohim <WG2316>, who <WG3739> is <WG2076> <WG5748> the Saviour <WG4990> of all <WG3956> men <WG444>, specially <WG3122> of those that believe <WG4103>.

Let <WG2706> no man <WG3367> despise <WG2706> <WG5720> thy <WG4675> youth <WG3503>; but <WG235> be thou <WG1096> <WG5737> an example <WG5179> of the believers <WG4103>, in <WG1722> word <WG3056>, in <WG1722> conversation <WG391>, in <WG1722> charity <WG26>, in <WG1722> spirit <WG4151>, in <WG1722> faith <WG4102>, in <WG1722> purity <WG47>.
Till <WG2193> I come <WG2064> <WG5736>, give attendance <WG4337> <WG5720> to reading <WG320>, to exhortation <WG3874>, to doctrine <WG1319>.

Neglect <WG272> <WG5720> not <WG3361> the gift <WG5486> that is in <WG1722> thee <WG4671>, which <WG3739> was given <WG1325> <WG5681> thee <WG4671> by <WG1223> prophecy <WG4394>, with <WG3326> the laying on <WG1936> of the hands <WG5495> of the presbytery <WG4244>.

Meditate upon <WG3191> <WG5720> these things <WG5023>; give thyself <WG2468> <WG5749> wholly to <WG1722> them <WG5125>; that <WG2443> thy <WG4675> profiting <WG4297> may <WG5600> <WG5753> appear <WG5318> to <WG1722> all <WG3956>.

Take heed <WG1907> <WG5720> unto thyself <WG4572>, and <WG2532> unto the doctrine <WG1319>; continue <WG1961> <WG5720> in them <WG846>: for <WG1063> in doing <WG4160> <WG5723> this <WG5124> thou shalt <WG4982> both <WG2532> save <WG4982> <WG5692> thyself <WG4572>, and <WG2532> them that hear <WG191> <WG5723> thee <WG4675>.
